segments.text: My gaze shifts to the left, where two children are engaged in a secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open upper cabinet, pulling cookies from a jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it's about to tip backward at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's got a plate in his other hand, perhaps to catch the cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Next to him, a girl stands with her arm raised, palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite daring, given how close they are to the oblivious woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't give way beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling with a jar of cookies makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be enjoying their little adventure immensely.
segments.speaker: PAR
